snippet: A new report describes the life and thinking of Mansour J. Arbabsiar, a used-car salesman accused of being the American nexus of a plot to assassinate a Saudi diplomat.
abstract: Dr Gregory B Saathoff, psychiatrist retained to assess mental health of Mansour J Arbabsiar, Iranian-American accused in plot to assassinate the Saudi ambassador to the United States, files report in Federal District Court in Manhattan; concludes that Arbabsiar did not suffer from any mental illness that would have precluded him from knowingly consenting to being questioned after his arrest.
lead_paragraph: A new report describes the life and thinking of Mansour J. Arbabsiar, a used-car salesman accused of being the American nexus of a plot to assassinate a Saudi diplomat.

headline.seo: Psychiatrist Details Talks With Suspect in Bomb Plot
headline.main: Psychiatrist Details Talks With Suspect in Bomb Plot
headline.print_headline: Psychiatrist Details Talks With Suspect in Bomb Plot
